title: I'm sure I know what this one is…
content:
I’ve been racking my brains trying to figure out what this font is. I am sure I know what it is (maybe even have it…) but it’s being annoyingly illusive. WhatTheFont has been no help whatsoever, offering up Comic Sans lookalikes :(

Anyways, can anyone \*please\* help me identify what this is? Thanks so much if you can!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [The Illusive Face](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006024036/http:/typophile.com/files/Boundary%20Issues_%20Letting%20the%20Outdoors%20In%20-%20New%20York%20Times.png) | 22.13 KB |

 [‹ NFL (american football) field font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006024036/http:/typophile.com/node/50160 "Go to previous forum topic") [Capitolium? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006024036/http:/typophile.com/node/50156 "Go to next forum topic")
author: obeattie

comments.content: And my title was just raped by the system. It was supposed to read (“I’m sure I know what this one is…”)
